alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:07PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Deschutes County through 630 PM PDT... At 605 PM PDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Bend, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph or greater. Small hail and brief heavy rain will also be possible. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bend, Redmond, Tumalo and Deschutes River Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
